description:
Learn SAP Lumira from scratch with HD video instructions.

Learn the following tips and tricks:

  • What is Business Intelligence ?
  • How to get insight about your business in real-time ?
  • How to forecast your sales ?
  • How to forecast the weather ?
  • How to create your own Reports and Dashboards ?
  • How to share them with anyone ?
  • How to convert your raw data to Geo Map and Interactive Dashboards ?

The course is demonstrated with live SAP Lumira Application in easy to follow steps. You will also gain valuable insights into business Intelligence.

This Course is taught by an instructor who has more than 5 years of SAP BI / BO / HANA / SAP Business One experience with numerous implementations.

In Addition, This Course is provided for anyone, who interested in Business Intelligence (For Examples: Students, SAP user, Oracle user, Microsoft SQL user, Hadoop, IBM and HP user.
title: Learn SAP Lumira for Beginners
